item.title: Nike expects sales will plunge in current quarter as it faces tariffs, sliding consumer confidence
item.description: Nike is trying to execute a turnaround under new CEO Elliott Hill.

item.title: Micron shares jump on earnings beat, rosy guidance as data center revenue triples
item.description: Micron shares rose in extended trading Thursday after the company reported better-than-expected results and issued guidance that topped estimates.

item.title: Darden Restaurants sales disappoint, but Olive Garden parent sees consumers continuing to spend
item.description: Olive Garden and LongHorn Steakhouse reported weaker-than-expected same-store sales growth in Darden's latest quarter.

item.title: Tencent profit surges 90% as it touts AI revenue boost and ramps up spending
item.description: Tencent on Wednesday posted a fourth-quarter beat on top and bottom line driven by a surge in gaming and advertising revenue.

item.title: Shares of DocuSign surge 14% on strong earnings, AI boost
item.description: CEO Allan Thygesen said the company has "started to turn the corner on the core business."
